scripts.start: cd src && bower install && cd .. && cd functions && npm install && cd .. && npm install
scripts.dev: npm run start && npm run build:dev && node node_modules/pwa-build dev --config config/main.js
scripts.deploy: npm run build:prod && firebase deploy --only functions,hosting
scripts.deploy:fn: npm run build:prod && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:host: npm run build:prod && firebase deploy --only hosting
